title: Natural State Acupuncture
description: Serving Rogers, Bentonville, Bella Vista, Springdale and Fayetteville, Natural State Acupuncture integrates modern science and ancient wisdom. We are a patient-centered clinic with special emphasis on facial rejuvenation and stress management.
cleaned_text: Serving Rogers, Bentonville, Bella Vista, Springdale and Fayetteville, Natural State Acupuncture integrates modern science and ancient wisdom. We are a patient-centered clinic with special emphasis on facial rejuvenation and stress management. Reach optimum balance and health.
